title: P22 & IHOF Acquires Canada Type & More
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135723/http:/www.typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 1.Oct.2008 12.38pm 

For Immediate Release  
Buffalo, NY- October 1st, 2008

P22 and the International House of Fonts proudly announce P22 Counter- a  
new typeface designed by Canada Type’s Patrick Griffin for P22’s IHOF  
collection.

Designed by Canada Type principal Patrick Griffin, P22 Counter is a very  
geometric font based on parallel strokes. The Cursive and Swash Alts styles  
were based on the idea for an uncredited film face called Whitley,  
published by a little known English typesetting house in the early 1970s.  
Line & Hack are extrapolations of the above.

Single styles are offered in basic OpenType with linguistic support for  
Central and Eastern European, Turkish, Baltic, Celtic/Welsh and Esperanto  
character sets.

Counter Cursive Pro combines Cursive & Swash Alts.

[http://www.p22.com/ihof/counter.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135723/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/counter.html "http://www.p22.com/ihof/counter.html")  
————————————————————————  
For the month of October, P22 is offering a special Halloween-themed font  
pack- Five Frightening Fonts From Five Foundries! Included are (P22) Posada  
Extras, (IHOF) Aglio, (LTC) Lanston Halloween Ornaments, (Sherwood)  
Phantasmagoria, and (Rimmer) Zigarre Script.

[http://www.p22.com/products/monthly.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081026135723/http:/www.p22.com/products/monthly.html "http://www.p22.com/products/monthly.html")

The P22 type preview tool, the TypeCaster has been revamped for easier  
previewing and better resolution. Now you can zoom in as well as out to see  
any given font in any given size with any of your own text. Give it a try!
